suggest.ext-openssl: For key management (creation, optimization, etc.) and some algorithms (AES, RSA, ECDSA, etc.)
suggest.ext-gmp: GMP or BCMath is highly recommended to improve the library performance
suggest.ext-bcmath: GMP or BCMath is highly recommended to improve the library performance
suggest.ext-sodium: Sodium is required for OKP key creation, EdDSA signature algorithm and ECDH-ES key encryption with OKP keys
suggest.paragonie/sodium_compat: Sodium is required for OKP key creation, EdDSA signature algorithm and ECDH-ES key encryption with OKP keys
suggest.spomky-labs/aes-key-wrap: For all Key Wrapping algorithms (AxxxKW, AxxxGCMKW, PBES2-HSxxx+AyyyKW...)
